comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Here's a 1904 Sydney Mail item on the Bank of Australasia building, which had then recently been completed - news.google.com/newspapers?id=9GxVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=UpUDA... ; In this PHM pic we see the David Jones building with the addtional two stories which were added in 1906. Here's how DJs looked before the additional stories were added - www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/4067190284/
